DOC.criteria: Has body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 Is good physical health Agrees use approve method contraception duration study Additional criterion may apply Has current evidence , history clinically significant medical psychiatric condition observe abnormality Is currently pregnant breastfeeding Has history current infection hepatitis B virus , hepatitis C virus , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Has lifetime history opioid abuse dependence Has current abuse dependence alcohol drug Has use nicotine within 90 day prior randomization Additional criterion may apply
